name: Microms' World
description:
############# Microms's World ##############

Microms's World is my entry for the LudumDare38 jam. The theme was "Small World".

This is my first entry in a jam without any team besides me. I firstly intended to enter the compo but I missed the deadline by a few hours... :'( I had a great fun working on all the pixel art animations ;)

In Microms's World, you have to help the Microms prosper and win as much point as possible.

The Microms need food to survive, fortunately, you can get some by targeting the Flying Creatures floating above their village.

The more Microms you have, the more points you'll earn, but the more food you'll need !

Have fun !

---------- Controls -----------

Drag'n'drop Microms on the catapult and target the Flying Creatures

Shoot the seed bearers creatures to get new Microms
